code: import React from'react';import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Preview=props=>{let words=props.text.split(' ');let words_len=0;if(props.text.length!==0){if(props.text.charAt(props.text.length-1)===' '){words_len=words.length-1;}else{words_len=words.length;}}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{color:props.mode==='dark'?'white':'black'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[props.text.length," characters and ",words_len," words"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Preview"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:props.text})]})]});};export default Preview;
